text: The Hoop Life is a TV series depicting the lives of a team of basketball players in the fictional UBA (United Basketball Association), starring Rick Peters as Greg Marr, Mykelti Williamson as Marvin Buxton, and Cirroc Lofton as b-ball prodigy Curtis Thorpe.
